mapper.select: select BookNO as bookNo,BookName as bookName,Author as Authors,Publishment as Publish,ButTime as buyTime,Borrowed as isBorrow,Ordered as isOrder from books where BookName like #{username} limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
select BookNO as bookNo,BookName as bookName,Author as Authors,Publishment as Publish,ButTime as buyTime,Borrowed as isBorrow,Ordered as isOrder from books
select count(BookNO) from books where BookName like #{username}
mapper.update: update books set BookName = #{bookName},Author = #{Authors},Publishment = #{Publish},ButTime = #{buyTime},Borrowed = #{isBorrow},Ordered = #{isOrder} where BookNO = #{bookNo}
delete from books where BookNO in (${value})
